text:
@RahulGandhi Dear #Pappu & #pinky
If you really want to help , first help your maternal family members at #Italy by moving there with full family including your sister. Please bring learnings from #ItalyCoronavirus after eliminating #CoronavirusPandemic there so that we can learn. @Swamy39
